```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = FALSE)

`%>%` <- dplyr::`%>%`

all_pages <- list.files(here::here("docs/"), pattern = ".html")
all_pages <- all_pages[-which(all_pages == "index.html")]

report_pages <- all_pages[stringr::str_which(all_pages, pattern = "full.html")]

rec_pages <- all_pages[stringr::str_which(all_pages, pattern = "recreational")]
```

# Preliminary reports
These reports are a preliminary analysis of ecological and socioeconomic data sourced from `assessmentdata`, `survdat`, and other public data sources.

```{r}
purrr::map(report_pages, 
           ~paste("<a href='https://rtabandera.github.io/esp_data_aggregation/", 
                  .x, "'>",
                  stringr::str_split_fixed(.x, pattern = "_", n = 2)[,1], 
                  "</a>", sep = "")) %>%
  unlist() %>%
  knitr::kable(col.names = "Species name")

```

# Recreational data
These reports are a preliminary analysis of recreational data only.

```{r}
purrr::map(rec_pages, 
           ~paste("<a href='https://rtabandera.github.io/esp_data_aggregation/", 
                  .x, "'>",
                  stringr::str_split_fixed(.x, pattern = ".h", n = 2)[,1], 
                  "</a>", sep = "")) %>%
  unlist() %>%
  knitr::kable(col.names = "File name")

```
